sentences.english: Does Bruce see him as a left-winger or a central midfielder?
sentences.chinese: 布魯斯會把他當成一個左邊鋒還是中場球員？

sentences.english: Bayern Munchen is looking for a defensive wing.
sentences.chinese: 拜仁在尋找一個邊路防守球員。
“莫里森是個很棒的球員，”布朗說。

sentences.english: GLO started the sponsorship of the Confederation of African Football African Player of the Year Award.
sentences.chinese: 格洛開始贊助的非洲足球聯合會非洲年度最佳球員。

sentences.english: I think he will be the best of the best.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲，他將會成爲出色球員中的佼佼者。

sentences.english: No problem, I once played a 2-meter-high player successfully.
sentences.chinese: 沒問題，我曾經成功的防守一個2米高的球員。

sentences.english: You are the steadiest of steady.
sentences.chinese: 你是聯盟裏最最穩定的球員。

sentences.english: I was recruited to play intercollegiate basketball and became a professional player.
sentences.chinese: 開始打的是大學籃球，後來成爲了一名職業球員。

sentences.english: When I started playing, midfielders were all- rounders.
sentences.chinese: 以前我開始踢球時，每個中場球員都是全能型的。

sentences.english: Why are so many people always so critical of English players’ technique?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼總是有那麼多人對英國球員的技術那麼苛責？

sentences.english: West Ham have admitted that they fielded players illegally.
sentences.chinese: 西漢姆承認他們是非法引進球員。

sentences.english: There are the Primavera youngsters who arrive here and acquire the mentality of a fantastic team.
sentences.chinese: 也會有青訓球員一起訓練，學習球隊的精神。

sentences.english: We lost a lot of players of that ilk.
sentences.chinese: 這個夏天很多球員離開了我們。

sentences.english: These young footballers show a lot of promise.
I enjoy productive players with intelligence and the capacity to make everyone around them more productive.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡這種用自己的智慧和能力盤活全隊的球員。

sentences.english: Derek Fisher is the president of the NBA Players' Assn . and he will attend meetings in Phoenix.
sentences.chinese: 小魚是NBA球員協會的主席，他也將出現在鳳凰城。

definition: to be present/to be on the scene
to attack/to assault/to go on the offensive/attack/assault/offense (sports)
